name: Rock Smacker 2
description:
The highly anticipated sequel to the Reto-Darling "ROCK SMACKER" is finally here!

In "ROCK SMACKER 2" you smack those dirty rocks back into their holes. 

With Over "2 hole" levels full of that sweet puzzle action you know and love. 

My first Jam, I used Construct 3 and a lovely tutorial series by Vimlark. I Basically followed his tutorial to the letter. I had high hopes to use his engine as a template to build upon and to actually have it fit the GMTK 2021 Jam theme. However I ran out of time and was only able to build a few levels and unique puzzles. I think the puzzles I designed are fun though so I'm releasing this as a sequel to Vimlark's Game Engine.

Have Fun and Happy Smacking!!!

Assets Used:

Rock Smacker - Vimlark Vimlark - YouTube

Tiny Adventure Pack - Vryell Tiny Adventure Pack by Vryell (itch.io)

Weiholmir - JustFredrik https://justfredrik.itch.io/weiholmir

Fx Pixel Art Pack 01 - Hugues Laborde https://hugues-laborde.itch.io/fx-pix...

Minimalistic Loops - Goose Ninja https://gooseninja.itch.io/minimalist...

8 Bit Sound Pack - Danereid1024 (Sounds by Dane) https://danereid1024.itch.io/8-bit-so...
